verses.content: Chun, chu hnunga chun David chun, “Juda ram khâwlai ama- niah ka hang fe ding?” tiin LALPA a rawn a. Chun, LALPA chun a kuomah, “Hang fe raw khai,” a ta. David chun, “Khâwlai am ka hang fe ding?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Hebronah,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chu chutaka chun a hang fe tah a, a nuhmeihai pahni Jezreel mi Ahinoam le Kar- mela Nabal nuhmei Abigail le khan.
Chun, David chun a kuoma mi um po pohai chu a ṭhuoi a, mi tin an sûngkuohai seng leh, Hebron khuoa chun an um a.
Chun, Juda rama mihai an va feh a, Juda mihai chunga lal dingin David chu hriek an nâl tah a. Chun, “Saula phûmtuhai chu Jabes-gilead mihai an nih,” tiin David chu an hril a.
Chuongchun, Jabes-gilead mihai kuoma chun David chun mi a tir a, an kuomah, “In lalpa Saula chu hi lung- insietna hi suklangin ama chu in lo phûm ta leiin LALPA chun malsâwm raw se cheu.
Chuongchun, LALPA chun in chungah zainêmna le thutak inlang- tir sienla, hieng thil in thaw lei hin kei khawma in lunginsietna man chu thung ka ti cheu.
Chuongchun, in kuthai chu hung hrât sienla, huoitakin um ro, in lalpa Saula chu a thi ta sih a; chun, Juda chihai chun an chunga lal dingin hriek an mi nâl ta bawk a,” a ta.
Chun, Nera naupa Abner, Saula sipai hotu chun Saula naupa Is- boseth chu Mahanaimah a ṭhuoi a,
Gilead chunga dâm, Asur mihai chunga dâm, Jezreel chunga dâm, Ephraim chunga dâm, Israel chung po poah lalah a siem tah a.
(Saula naupa Is-boseth chu Israel chunga ro a rêl ṭan lai chun kum sâwmli mi a na, kum hni ro a rêl a). Nisienlakhawm, Juda mihai chun David chu an pawm lem a.
Davidin Hebrona Juda chihai chunga ro a rêlna chu kum sari le thla ruk a ni tah a.
Chun, Nera naupa Abner le Saula naupa Is-boseth siehlawhai chu Mahanaima inthawk an suok a, Gibeonah an feh a.

Chun, Zeruia naupa Joab le David siehlawhai chu an fe suok a, Gibeon dîla chun an intuok a; chuong- chun, pâwl khat chu dîl râl khing- tieng chun an ṭhung a, pâwl khat dang chu dîl râl khingtieng chun.
Chun, Abner chun Joab kuom- ah, “Tlangvâlhai chu hung inthawk- hai sienla, ei hmaa hin hang inthaw ta hai sienla,” a ta. Chun, Joab chun, “Hung inthawk e â,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an inthawk a, an ni zât chin ruot chie chu an kai a, Benjamin chi Saula naupa Is-boseth tienga ṭhang chu sâwm le pahni; chun, David siehlawhai chu sâwm le pahni bawk.

An khingpuihai chu an lu sengah an inman a, mâni bitumhai chu an nâkah kâwlhnâmin an insun seng a; chuongchun, an tlu ta vawng el a; chuleiin, chu hmun chu Helkath-Hazurim an ti tah a; chu chu Gibeona um a nih.
Chuongchun, chu nia an inthaw chu a nasa ta hle a, chun, Abner le Israel mihai chu David siehlawhai hmaa chun an tlâwm tah a.
Chun, chutaka chun Zeruia naupasalhai pathum Joab le Abisai le Asahel hai chu an um a, Asahel chu sazukpui ang ela ngal hrât a nih.
Chuongchun, Asahel chun Abner chu a hnawt a, Abner a hnawt chu changtieng le vawitieng khawm pêt hlek loin a hnawt a.
Chuongchun, Abner chu a hang nghale a, “Nang i ni maw Asahel?” a hei tih a. Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Kei ka nih ie,” a ta.

Chun, Abner chun, a kuomah, “I changtieng amanih, i vawitieng amani khan pêt la, tlangvâl pakhat kha man la, a râlthuom kha lâkpêk rawh,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, Asahel chun ama a hnawt chu a pêtsan nuom chuong nawh a.
Chun, Abner chun Asahel kuomah, “Mi pêtsan rawh, iengdingin am sunthlûng ka ti cheh a? I unaupa Joab hmêl ka hmu ngam ding am a nih?” a ti nâwk a.

Nisienlakhawm, a pêt nuom chuong nawh a, chuleiin, Abner chun a feiṭhut tiengin a phîngah a sun a, a fei chu a hnungtieng a tlang a, chutaka chun a tlu ta tawp a, chu hmuna chun a thi tah a; chun, Asahel a tlûka a thina hmun hung tlung taphawthai chu chutaka chun an ngîr chawt pei a.
Nisienlakhawm, Joab le Abisai chun Abner chu an hnawt pei a, chun, Gibeon thlalêr lampuia Gia dep Amma tlâng an tlung chun nisa a tla tah a.
Chun, Benjamin thlahai chu Abner kuoma chun an pungkhâwm a, pâwl khatah an insiem a, tlâng sîpa chun an va ngîr tah a.

Chuongchun, Abner chun Joab chu a ko a, “Kâwlhnâm hin a vât zing ding am a nih? A tâwp tieng chun la lunginzîngum hlêng a tih ti i hriet naw am a nih? Mipuihai chu ieng chen am an unauhai hnawt kîrsan dinga hril loin i um ding a na?” a ta.
Chun, Joab chun, “Pathien hringna sâlin ka hril a nih, ieng- khawm lo hril naw la chu mipuihai chu zîngkâr khan an fe hmang ta ding a na, an unauhai chu an hnawt naw ding bah,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab chun taw- tawrâwt chu a hei mût a, mipuihai chu an ngîr ta ṭhuop a, Israel mihai chu an hnawt ta nawh a, an thaw nâwk ta nawh a.
Chuongchun, Abner le a mihai chu chu zân chun zânkhawvârin an feh a, chun, Jordan an kai a, Bithron an fe thleng rak a, Mahanaim an tlung tah a.
Chun, Joab chu Abner a hnawt chu a kîr tah a; chun, mipuihai po po a hei ko khâwm chun David rawihai sâwmpakuo le Asahel an lo kim ta nawh a.
David rawihai ruok chun Benjamin mihai le Abner mihai chu za thum le sâwmruk an sukhlum a.
Chuongchun, Asahel ruong chu an lâk a, Bethlehema a pa thlânah an phûm a. Chun, Joab le a mihai chu zânkhawvârin an feh a, Hebron an tlung chun khuo a var a.
